column4: Sorry for this stupid question, but what IRC channel is used for Ubuntu Netbook Remix?
Thanks.  I had a Dumb Idea this morning for Remix and I thought I'd test it here first: A dynamically warping virtual keyboard for multi-touch internet tablets.
I wrote up the idea at http://www.billrocks.org
The idea is that when you place 8 fingers down, an keyboard appears, warped to fit your finger placement.  As you type, it adjusts.
